title: BRIEF-Old Mutual Updates on On U.S Legacy Matters
text: March 13, 2018 / 7:51 AM / in 6 minutes BRIEF-Old Mutual Updates on On U.S Legacy Matters Reuters Staff March 13 (Reuters) - Old Mutual Plc: * STATEMENT ON US LEGACY MATTERS * ‍NOTES THAT TRAVELERS COMPANIES, INC. AND ST. PAUL FIRE AND MARINE INSURANCE COMPANY HAVE LODGED A CLAIM IN UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT * CLAIM ‍IN RELATION TO PRE-EXISTING PLC HEAD OFFICE LEGACY ITEMS RELATING TO PREVIOUSLY DISPOSED OF US ASSETS * ‍BELIEVE THAT THIS ACTION IS WITHOUT MERIT AND WILL RESIST ACCORDINGLY * ‍MANAGED SEPARATION REMAINS ON TRACK FOR MATERIAL COMPLETION BY END OF 2018​​​​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
